task.title: How To Make a Protein Smoothie

taskbody.prereq:
This task will teach you how to make a Strawberry Vanilla protein smoothie.
Ingredients/Tools:
4 scoops of vanilla whey protein
1 cup of water
1 cup of strawberry Greek Yogurt
1 cup of apple sauce
3 cups of frozen strawberries
1 cup of ice
Magic Bullet Blender

step.cmd: Pour each individual ingredient into the magic bullet's clear plastic pitcher one at a time.
step.info:
The Magic Bullet is a high powered blender, and should be used carefully.Be sure that the blender is unplugged and unhooked while pouring ingredients. The blade spins very fast and could cause injury if not monitored.
Magic Bullet Blender

step.cmd: Twist on the lid of the Magic Bullet until sealed tight
Flip the pitcher upside-down so that the lid aligns with the rim atop the Magic Bullet logo.
Push the pitcher down into the base and hold until the drink is smooth enough to drink with a straw
Remove the pitcher from the base, and flip it back upright
